posts.postText: When only 1 person is on the server, round won't start till at least 2 people on. I know it sounds stupid to have a game with only 1 person, but when server is empty, you know people are much more likely to join if they see someone is on, even if it is just 1 person. it's much easier to sit and wait for someone to join if you can at least wander around and play on server, even if it's alone, it alot better than being stuck in waiting list.
